title: Willian wants to play for Chelsea '300 more times' with contract running to an end
text:
Chelsea forward Willian says he would love to stay at the club and make another 300 appearances as his contract runs down at Stamford Bridge.

Willian recently made his 300th appearance for the Blues, but faces an uncertain future with his current deal set to expire at the end of the season.

Chelsea are yet to offer the Brazilian a new deal and with manager Frank Lampard putting his faith in youth, there is no guarantee he will be offered fresh terms.

Willian wants to extend his stay at Chelsea after entering the final 12 months of his contract

The midfielder recently made his 300th appearance for the club he joined back in 2013

Willian has enjoyed a trophy-laden stay at Chelsea, including last season's Europa League

However, in an interview with Chelsea's official website, Willian revealed his happines with life in south west London and desire to extend his stay.

'I always believed I could play so many games. I had to believe,' he said.

'It's difficult to achieve this number, especially when you play for a big club like Chelsea because there are many, many players that are fighting for the same position. It was a challenge for me.

Willian: 2019/20 stats Appearances: 9 Goals: 2 Assists: 1

'In football you have to prove yourself every day, in every game. When you stop doing that you have to stop playing. You have to prove it to yourself as well. I have done that.

'I have been here already for six years, I have had different managers, different players in the squad, and I was proving every training session, every game, that I can play many, many years for this club.

'I think I have improved a lot. Every game you can learn from. Then after every game you ask yourself 'What have I done well, what have I not done well?' I always want to continue improving.

'Now I'm very proud to reach this number, and I hope for 300 more to come!'

Willian joined Chelsea from Shakhtar Donetsk in August 2013 and has since won two Premier League titles, the Europa League, two FA Cups and one League Cup.
description: Chelsea forward Willian says he would love to extend his six-year stay at the club after recently making his 300th appearance for the Blues, with his contract set to expire in May.
